string-array.name: quotes
string-array.item: \"If I were not a physicist, I would probably be a musician. I often think in music. I live my daydreams in music. I see my life in terms of music\"
\"Who hears music, feels his solitude Peopled at once.\"
\"Live your truth. Express your love. Share your enthusiasm. Take action towards your dreams. Walk your talk. Dance and sing to your music. Embrace your blessings. Make today worth remembering\"
\"Information is not knowledge. Knowledge is not wisdom. Wisdom is not truth. Truth is not beauty. Beauty is not love. Love is not music. Music is THE BEST\"
\"Music makes one feel so romantic – at least it always gets on one’s nerves – which is the same thing nowadays\"
\"Music is the strongest form of magic.\"
\"Music in the soul can be heard by the universe\"
\"My personal hobbies are reading, listening to music, and silence.\"
\"Music is everybody’s business. It’s only the publishers who think people own it\"
\"People ask me how I make music. I tell them I just step into it. It’s like stepping into a river and joining the flow. Every moment in the river has its song\"
\"Music touches us emotionally, where words alone can’t.\"
